item.title: Machiavelli in Love
item.description: Ruggiero does it again: a great companion piece to months of Renaissance reading, including [[authors/niccolo machiavelli|Machiavelli]].

item.title: Six Memos for the Next Millennium
item.description: At this rate, this is the year of [[authors/ursula k le guin|Ursula]] and Italo rearranging my thoughts, not to mention my reading and writing.

item.title: What Makes This Book So Great
item.description: We need an SF laureate the way we have poet laureate. I nominate Jo.

item.title: Wintering
item.description: DNF due to the health scare(s) both May and her husband experience at the beginning of the book. Even though I knew they were okay, it was too much to relive in the moment, my own recent family health scares too fresh.
